alert.note: Alert for Central Washington; Coastal Hancock; Coastal Washington; Interior Hancock; Southern Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 9:12PM EST until January 05 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches, sleet accumulations around one quarter of an inch and ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of Coastal DownEast, Interior DownEast, and Penobscot Valley Maine * WHEN...Until 5 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Expect slippery roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Central Washington; Coastal Hancock; Coastal Washington; Interior Hancock; Southern Penobscot
